name: Arittek
description: Founded on a simple insight to serve the always-connected world by creating and nurturing smart technology solutions aimed at business excellence. At Arittek, we have an insatiable appetite for thinking about whats now and whats coming next. We are fast and responsive to the changing world of business and believe strongly in the insights of consumers to deliver smart ideas and technology solutions that drive your businesses, regardless of channel or geography.

locations.address: Office 2, Floor 3rd, Building # 34c Lane 4 Khayaben-e-Shahbaz DHA
